scenes.title: The Troll in the Dungeon
scenes.context: A massive mountain troll enters Hogwarts on Halloween night. The students are panicking as the troll wreaks havoc in the bathroom.

scenes.title: The Philosopher's Stone
scenes.context: Harry, Hermione, and Ron face the final chamber protecting the Philosopher's Stone, with Harry confronting Professor Quirrell and Voldemort’s spirit.

scenes.title: The Chamber of Secrets
scenes.context: Harry encounters Tom Riddle and the Basilisk inside the Chamber of Secrets. The giant serpent slithers closer.

scenes.title: The Time-Turner Rescue
scenes.context: Harry and Hermione use the Time-Turner to save Sirius Black and Buckbeak. They must avoid being seen by their past selves.

scenes.title: The Triwizard Tournament - The Maze
scenes.context: Harry and Cedric enter the Triwizard Maze, filled with dangerous enchantments and creatures, leading to Voldemort’s rebirth.

scenes.title: Dumbledore vs Voldemort
scenes.context: At the Ministry of Magic, Dumbledore and Voldemort duel fiercely, with Harry caught in the chaos.

scenes.title: The Astronomy Tower
scenes.context: On the Astronomy Tower, Draco confronts Dumbledore, but Death Eaters arrive. Snape’s true allegiance is unclear.

scenes.title: Battle of Hogwarts
scenes.context: Hogwarts is under siege. Students, professors, Death Eaters, and creatures fight in an all-out war.

scenes.title: The Forbidden Forest
scenes.context: Harry willingly walks into the Forbidden Forest to sacrifice himself to Voldemort, clutching the Resurrection Stone.

scenes.title: Final Duel
scenes.context: Harry and Voldemort face off in their climactic final duel. The fate of the wizarding world hangs in the balance.
